title: How to find correct IPv4 address of my device - Quora

response.answer_text: Step-1 go to the CMD prompt ..type ”ipconfig” and hit enterthen you will get list of connected address of the ipv4 and ipv6now, you will see your IPv4 address of Ethernet port as well as ,, wlan port..now , according to your requirement ..select the address of the IPv4 .Step-2 go to the “Change Adapter setting” of your system.Right click on the connected network. Choose “properties” .you will See IPv4 and IPv6 in list below.click on IPv4 .and click on propertiesthen you will see ..address of yours question.thanks.
press win+rtypes CMD open black screennow types ipconfigapeare the address ipv4 6
